Pre-Game Insights: Bulgaria and Northern Ireland both have strong starts in Group C3 of the UEFA Nations League.
Northern Ireland has a 4-game winning streak with clean sheets in their last 6 matches, while Bulgaria has 6 consecutive draws.
Michael O'Neill has improved Northern Ireland's confidence, while Ilian Iliev has maintained Bulgaria's form with 6 draws in his 7 matches.
Bulgaria's recent draw against Belarus and Northern Ireland's win over Luxembourg set the stage for this match.
O'Neill may rotate his squad due to limited game time, while Bulgaria will miss Filip Krastev due to suspension.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The preview suggests a possible 1-1 draw based on Bulgaria's tendency under Ilian Iliev and Northern Ireland's recent form.
